description: This file defines the S3TextKnowledgeBase class, which manages reading text documents from an S3 bucket, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous iteration over document lists.

classes.name: S3TextKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that extends S3KnowledgeBase to provide functionality for iterating over text documents stored in an S3 bucket, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous methods.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Synchronous property that yields lists of Document objects from text files in the S3 bucket.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous property that yields lists of Document objects from text files in the S3 bucket.
